arts.ttl: Could Arsenal, Man Utd-Linked Star Leave PSG in January? Pundit Weighs In
arts.sum: Over the last few days, Paris Saint-Germain forward Randal Kolo Muani has been the subject of transfer rumors. The Frenchman has failed to establish himself under manager Luis Enrique but thrives under manager French national team boss Didier Deschamps. arts.ttl: Ligue 1 round-up as promising teenager opens PSG account
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain returned to the summit of Ligue 1 on Saturday as they saw off Strasbourg with a 4-2 victory at home. 18-year-old midfielder Senny Mayulu opened the scoring with the first league goal of his fledgling career, before Marco Asensio doubled their lead just after the break. Seko Marou got one back for the […] The post Ligue 1 round-up as promising teenager opens PSG account first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Barcola scores and assists as PSG returns to the top of the French league
arts.sum: South Korea forward Lee Kang-in added another PSG goal, before sloppy defending allowed the visitors to pull one back in stoppage time through 18-year-old Senegalese midfielder Pape Daouda Diong. The 18-year-old Mayulu was given a rare game as coach Luis Enrique rested players ahead of Tuesday’s Champions League game against PSV Eindhoven.

arts.ttl: Manchester United Could Be Perfect Fit for PSG, Tottenham Target, Claims Ex-Player
arts.sum: This past summer, Paris Saint-Germain was one of the clubs keen on Sporting Lisbon midfielder Morten Hjulmand. Moreover, the Portuguese club stood firm as they didn’t want to sell him unless his €80 million release clause was triggered. Last season, the 24-year-old made 49 appearances in all competitions, scoring four goals and providing four assists.
